name: Gunman Arcade
description:
A - move left

D - move right

G - throw molotov

SPACE - shoot

Simple arcade game, play it either in browser or download executable for free!

I've decided to release the game because I have lost interest for this project.

Made this game a while ago and it was just sitting on my pc unpublished so I'm finally publishing it!

Perfect game to kill a few minutes of boredom!
